# Problem 1 

 Function for performing a one-sample t-test and returning the p-value
 
```{r eval=FALSE}


sim_t_test = function ( n , mu= 0, sigma =5) {
  
  sim_data = 
    tibble(
    x = rnorm (n, mean= mu, sd= sigma))
  
  t_test_result= 
    sim_data|>
    t.test(x, mu = mu) |>
    broom::tidy() |>
    select(p.value)
  
  return(p.value)
  
}

sim_t_test(n=3)
```
